variants.desc:
A shadow manifested by the power of a Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A living being of energy born from the projection of the desires of sentient lifeforms into the Fragmentum, akin to a pearl created from a single grain of sand. This energy wanders around aimlessly, acting only when executing the will of its master.

skills.name: Thunderstorm Condemnation
skills.desc: Deals successive minor Lightning DMG to a random target, with a chance to inflict Shock.

skills.name: Lightning Recollection
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Lightning Condemnation
skills.desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Tranquil Ban
skills.desc: Your team is imposed with a ban on attacking the Guardian Shadow. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Disarm Ban
skills.desc: Your team is imposed with a ban on using Basic ATK. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Silent Ban
skills.desc: Your team is imposed with a ban on using Skill. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Inevitable Punishment
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to whoever violates the ban.

variants.name: Guardian Shadow (Bug)
